$.50 per play, $.45 if you're VIP. All machines run on a card reader system.

Great condition like new.  Needs leveling. Leans to the right causing ball to drain in outer lanes often.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Machine tilts to the right.  Flippers are strong and all switches work.

Right lane does not stick anymore on the rollover.  Machine has been cleaned and waxed.  Flippers work well with plenty of power to fire the ball up the ramps.  Right scoop is adjusted so it doesn’t fire the ball down the middle.
Ghostbusters plays much better. Right in-lane does not stick in the bell on the rollover anymore.
Left in lane rollover sticks causing ball to hang up.  Machine needs to be shaken to loosen ball from sticking.  Playfield needs cleaning.

$.50 per play, $.45 if you're VIP. All machines run on a card reader system. Software rev. 1.05 installed. Shooter lane autolaunches after 10 seconds, left kick out fires ball SDTM about 1/2 the time. Plays great otherwise.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Flippers have been readjusted to the proper angle.   Sparky posts are not missing rubber anymore.  Magnet catches ball during Sparky multi-ball and flings the ball properly.  Flippers are not weak anymore.  Best Metallica in town for public location.  Kudos to James for keeping the machines in great condition.  Playfields are now waxed on a weekly basis.

machine_conditions.comment: Flippers have been readjusted to the proper angle.   Sparky posts are not missing rubber anymore.  Magnet catches ball during Sparky multi-ball and flings the ball properly.  Flippers are not weak anymore.  Best Metallica in town for public location.  Kudos to James for keeping the machines in great condition.  Playfields are now waxed on a weekly basis.

Machine is out of order at this time.

$.50 per play, $.45 if you're VIP. All machines run on a card reader system. Original version of game, but has LEDs installed. Color changer LEDs strobe like a night club...

Left flipper angled too low, almost all mini post rubbers are missing. Playfield is dirty and flippers are worn & sloppy. Plays ok otherwise.
Flipper rubber is worn, playfield is dirty but machine plays well..

Left flipper is weak which can't make any ramp shots.  Snake sensor is out which doesn't register when the ball is shot in the mouth.  Left bumper rubber to the left of Sparky is completely gone exposing a metal post.  Can't start Crank it Up modes without Snake operating properly.
6/13 Left flipper tip is worn, snake sensor is out.  Played 7/19 and all was functioning properly.
